spiritsExplanation: The primary spirit of the workout is 'Soothing & Restorative', indicated by the video's focus on guided meditation for relaxation and stress relief. The title, 'Guided Meditation for Deep Relaxation', emphasizes relaxation and calmness, which aligns with the restorative spirit. The description mentions achieving a "stress-free, anxiety-free, worry-free life" and highlights the role of meditation in enhancing emotional and mental health. Tags such as "Meditation", "Peace", "Mindfulness", and "meditation for anxiety" reinforce this focus on recovery and stress reduction, characteristic of the soothing and restorative spirit. User comments further support this classification, noting outcomes like falling asleep during sessions and using meditation to relieve anxiety. Given these strong indicators, the confidence in the 'Soothing & Restorative' classification is high, with a score of 0.95.
